document.full_text: families of victims from sunday's tornado have begun to receive death notifications, and for bob heath, a police chaplain, delivering the news is more difficult in his hometown.
document.title: accustomed to bad news, joplin chaplain takes it personally this time
lines_and_colors: families of victims from sunday's tornado have begun to receive death notifications, and for bob heath, a police chaplain, delivering the news is more difficult in his hometown.
